name: Someplace safe
description:
If you’re someplace safe, why would you want to leave it?

Enjoy the story made in less than 40 hours. In pain. Tears. And a loss of sanity. 

Check out our visual novel full of adorable characters. Like this angry librarian. The most wholesome dad ever. A doggo. And a Pharaoh … apparently.

The main character is a young girl living in Wroclaw who is about to move out to start her university life. Before she does it though, she needs to resolve her problems in the hometown. The player has to think strategically - the protagonist may not want to do what she's told to. It is highly important to build her courage before the most important events. Unless, you want her to be called stupid. 

Revel in the most relatable game you’ve ever played where your biggest enemy is your fear and anxiety and conversations with people are like boss battles.

Someplace safe, available now.
